MajorClaims.MC1: it is obvious that prepared food can bring about some negative influence result from utilizing the artificial ingredients, ignoring the nutrition of food and modifying people's eating habits
MajorClaims.MC2: it is not a good thing

Claims.C1: it can effectively save time which is considered as money in our modern society
Claims.C2: easy-to-cook foods sometimes could be dangerous for human's health
Claims.C3: Not cooking fresh food will also lead to the lack of nutrition
Claims.C4: the invention of prepared foods definitely satisfies the demand of some people who are busy in their work
Claims.C5: The more prepared food we eat the more cooking skills we lose

Premises.P1: to make their food easier to prepare and taste delicious, almost every producer adds a wide range of artificial ingredients in to the food that is now purchased by most people
Premises.P2: ingredients being added have caused dire consequences
Premises.P3: there are usually some articles in newspapers and magazines which report the relationship between certain chemical components in some food and diseases
Premises.P4: Whereas some research has apparently demonstrated that prepared food is unable to support enough nutrients we need, especially for children who are growing up
Premises.P5: At the increasing living pace, the majority of people tend to choose microwave as their unique cooker that help them prepare a dish in five minutes
Premises.P6: rare people have been aware that this has contributed to a modification of cooking habits, which may cause the loss of our custom and culture about cooking
